analysis.description:
depositofferToken.refund (/unique_chucks/28/0xb402be8db1d9eb2beedfe2c8a6c38a604e9f13c6.sol#587-614) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _addr.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb402be8db1d9eb2beedfe2c8a6c38a604e9f13c6.sol#610-611)

depositofferToken.destroy (/unique_chucks/28/0xb402be8db1d9eb2beedfe2c8a6c38a604e9f13c6.sol#703-713) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)
